description.value: You can attack with a weapon twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn. If you are @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.nfEDSQG0DMBs7eGp.JournalEntryPage.0mJgDHc69dAZQtRr#dual-wielding]{dual-wielding}, your off-hand attack brings you to a total of three attacks.
